SEARCH
Package cocoa.service.impl

Class BondpairServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.service.impl.ServiceImpl<BondpairMapper,Bondpair>
cocoa.service.impl.BondpairServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BondpairService, com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.service.IService<Bondpair>
@Service public class BondpairServiceImpl extends com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.service.impl.ServiceImpl<BondpairMapper,Bondpair> implements BondpairService
Service implementation for handling operations related to Bondpair entities. Extends ServiceImpl and implements BondpairService interface. Provides business logic for saving, deleting, and retrieving Bondpair information and related BondpairPet data.

  • Method Details

    • saveWithPet

      public void saveWithPet(BondpairDto bondpairDto)
      Saves a Bondpair along with its associated BondpairPet records. The Bondpair is saved first, followed by the related BondpairPets, with the Bondpair ID being set for each BondpairPet.
      Specified by:
      saveWithPet in interface BondpairService
      Parameters:
      bondpairDto - The BondpairDto object containing the Bondpair and BondpairPets data to be saved.

    • removeWithPet

      public void removeWithPet(List<Long> ids)
      Removes a Bondpair and its related BondpairPet records. Before deletion, the adoption status of the Bondpair is checked to ensure it can be deleted. If the Bondpair is not adopted (status = 1), an exception is thrown.
      Specified by:
      removeWithPet in interface BondpairService
      Parameters:
      ids - A list of Bondpair IDs to be deleted.
      Throws:
      CustomException - if the Bondpair is not adopted, preventing deletion.

    • getBondpairData

      public BondpairDto getBondpairData(Long id)
      Retrieves detailed information for a specific Bondpair, including its associated BondpairPet records.
      Specified by:
      getBondpairData in interface BondpairService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the Bondpair to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A BondpairDto containing the Bondpair data and its related BondpairPets, or null if not found.
